title: Altered Structural Connectivity Detection in DIAN and WRAP Study
descriptions: Used TractSeg and Tractometry to compute the average representation along 50 fiber bundles
Applied the proposed manifold DCNN on fiber representation of the DTI images
Got statistically significant difference on 14 and 16 (out of 50) fiber bundles, by PiB-PET and Gene mutation carriers, on DIAN and WRAP dataset, with total 9 fiber bundles in common

title: Certified Robustness Training via Gaussian Distribution
descriptions: Applied the certifiable randomized smoothing robustness without sampling with 2× to 5× faster
Proposed a tight estimation of the channel-wise Gaussian distribution to reduce the cost from exponential to linear
Achieved 5% better certified accuracy as well as a larger certified radius on ImageNet and Places365

title: Flow-based Generative Model for Non-Euclidean Data, Manifold
descriptions: Introduced three invertible layers on manifold-valued data whose determinant of Jacobian is simple
Built the two-stream GLOW that can transfer information from one manifold to another
Transferred DTI to corresponding ODF with a small reconstruction error and maintaining verifiable group differences with p-value <0.001
In reality, this can save scanning time from 35 mins to 7-9 mins
Generated/ Mixed texture images based on the local covariance matrices

title: Point Cloud Completion
descriptions: Used the encoder-decoder based network to roughly complete the point cloud
Utilized the nearest neighbor in the training dataset to extract local information

title: Group Analysis for PiB Status with Seqential Deep Learning Model on DTI
descriptions: Used Ants as registration tool to warp information from template space into subject space
Extracted each voxel along each fiber bundles in DTI space to fit the sequential model
With PiB status as group, found 2 fiber bundles satisfying significance level

title: Dilated CNN in Group Analysis of Alzheimer’s Disease
descriptions: Pre-processed the dMRI to extract the centerline/ average values along fiber bundles
Applied SPD/S^n manifold into the Dilated CNN model to extract information from DTI/ ODF
Sped up the training and testing phases 5× with a competitive number of parameters with the state of the art model
Got statistically significant differences on 5 (out of 18) fiber bundles, with CSF, PiB and APOE biomarkers

title: Statistical Recurrent Model on the Manifold
descriptions: Defined the "+/ ×" operators in the manifold space
Modified the statistical recurrent model on the SPD manifold
Reduced the number of parameters of the video classification model by 100 times
Achieved the state of the art of accuracy in UCF11 dataset

title: Correlations for Image-Text Pair in Latent Space
descriptions: Applied the pre-trained CNN as the feature extractor from the image side
Applied the word2vec method on the text as the representative of text
Used t-SNE to minimize the KL divergence between latent space and the Image-Text pair
Got meaningful results on the local dataset gathered from Reddit

title: Form Line Detection in the Picture
descriptions: Developed a system that detects and recognizes the form lines in pictures
Used the bidirectional RNN method to achieve the state of the art, with MXNet as the core of the deep-learning system
Tested in multiple dataset such as the NIST Special Database 2 and got 99.0% accuracy rate

title: Keywords Detection in Video
descriptions: Developed a system that detects and recognizes Chinese characters in videos
Conducted  edge  detection  and  stroke  width  transform  to  generate  candidatepatches that might contain characters
Used the GoogLeNet to recognize characters in the patches with high likelihood
Implemented the A-star search with distance heuristic to speed up the detectionof characters in following frames

title: Emotion Detection in Voice Recordings
descriptions: Used different classifiers to predict the emotion of a speaker in a voice memo
Extracted voice features like MFCC, LPCC, Zero Cross Rate, etc., from FAU Aibo Emotion Corpus dataset
Trained both an SVM and a neural network using the features, tested them, and compared their accuracy with the state-of-the-art
